mapper.sql: id, code, name, sex, national_id, province, city, birthday, education_name, political_name, speciality, height, marriage_id, hukou, school_date, mobile, address, department_name, job_name, comment, photo
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, s.name as national_name, t.province, t.city, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.speciality, t.height, t.marriage_id, m.name as marriage_name, t.hukou, t.school_date, t.mobile, t.address, t.department_name, t.job_name, t.comment, t.photo FROM people_dispatch t LEFT JOIN dict_national s ON s.id = t.national_id LEFT JOIN dict_marriage m ON m.id = t.marriage_id
t.id = #{id}

select
from people_dispatch where name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into people_dispatch (code, name, sex, national_id, province, city, birthday, education_name, political_name, speciality, height, marriage_id, hukou, school_date, mobile, address, department_name, job_name, comment, photo) values ( #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{nationalId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{educationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriageId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hukou, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{schoolDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into people_dispatch (code, name, sex, national_id, province, city, birthday, education_name, political_name, speciality, height, marriage_id, hukou, school_date, mobile, address, department_name, job_name, comment, photo) values
( #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.nationalId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.educationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.politicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.marriageId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.hukou, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.schoolDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.departmentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update people_dispatch
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
national_id = #{nationalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
education_name = #{educationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
political_name = #{politicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speciality = #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marriage_id = #{marriageId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
hukou = #{hukou, jdbcType=TINYINT},
school_date = #{schoolDate,jdbcType=DATE},
mobile = #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_name = #{departmentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_name = #{jobName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, t.province, t.city, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.speciality, t.height, t.marriage_id, t.hukou, t.school_date, t.mobile, t.address, t.department_name, t.job_name, t.comment, t.photo from people_dispatch t where id in
#{item}

SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, s.name as national_name, t.province, t.city, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.speciality, t.height, t.marriage_id, m.name as marriage_name, t.hukou, t.school_date, t.mobile, t.address, t.department_name, t.job_name, t.comment, t.photo FROM people_dispatch t LEFT JOIN dict_national s ON s.id = t.national_id LEFT JOIN dict_marriage m ON m.id = t.marriage_id where t.id in
#{item}
